msg: - Revision removal needs the client to manually update the revision table.

author: remm
msg: If the commit() a few lines call throws an exception, for example to indicate
a rollback, no transaction would be associated with the thread anymore,
and a bogus IllegalStateException stack trace would be dumped.
- Note: OTOH, some logging should be done by the transaction manager.

author: remm
msg: - Update Domain.xml with the new (commented out) JDBC content store.
